00023 template <class Base>
00024 class TViewExtenderCompBase: public Base, virtual public IViewExtender
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        typedef Base BaseClass;
00028 
00029        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TViewExtenderCompBase);
00030               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IViewExtender);
00031               I_ASSIGN(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr, "SlaveSceneExtender", "Scene extender will be used to provide background shapes", false, "SlaveSceneExtender");
00032               I_ASSIGN(m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr, "ViewExtenderMode", "Control how the view extender works:\n\t0 - combine slave with current shapes\n\t1 - use slave by direct calls only\n\t2 - use slave always and current shapes indirect only\n\t3 - use slave by direct calls only and current shapes indirect only", true, 0);
00033               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_idFiltersAttrPtr, "SceneIdFilters", "Optional scene ID filters allowing to ignore some scene providers", false);
00034               I_ASSIGN(m_viewCalibrationProviderCompPtr, "ViewCalibrationProvider", "Calibration provider for the view", false, "ViewCalibrationProvider");
00035        I_END_COMPONENT;
00036 
00037        TViewExtenderCompBase();
00038 
00039        // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00040        virtual void AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags);
00041        virtual void RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr);
00042 
00043 protected:
00044        enum ExtenderMode
00045        {
00046               EM_COMBINE,
00047               EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY,
00048               EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT,
00049               EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT
00050        };
00051 
00052        typedef istd::TPointerVector<iview::IShape> Shapes;
00053        typedef QMap<IViewProvider*, Shapes> ShapesMap;
00054 
00055        bool IsViewIdSupported(int viewId) const;
00056        const ShapesMap& GetShapesMap() const;
00057 
00058        void UpdateAllViews();
00059 
00063        void UpdateViewCalibration(iview::IShapeView* viewPtr);
00064 
00065        // abstract methods
00066 
00071        virtual void CreateShapes(int viewId, Shapes& result) = 0;
00072 
00073 private:
00074        ShapesMap m_shapesMap;
00075        bool m_isSlaveShown;
00076 
00077        I_REF(IViewExtender, m_slaveExtenderCompPtr);
00078        I_REF(i2d::ICalibrationProvider, m_viewCalibrationProviderCompPtr);
00079        I_ATTR(int, m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr);
00080        I_MULTIATTR(int, m_idFiltersAttrPtr);
00081 
00082        istd::TDelPtr<i2d::ITransformation2d> m_viewCalibrationPtr;
00083 };

00097 template <class Base>
00098 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags)
00099 {
00100        I_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00101 
00102        int viewId = providerPtr->GetViewId();
00103        iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00104 
00105        bool showOwnShapes = true;
00106        bool showSlaveShapes = true;
00107 
00108        switch (*m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr){
00109        case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY:
00110               showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
00111               break;
00112 
00113        case EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
00114               showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
00115               break;
00116 
00117        case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
00118               showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
00119               showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
00120               break;
00121 
00122        default:
00123               break;
00124        };
00125 
00126 
00127        if (          showOwnShapes &&
00128                             (viewPtr != NULL) &&
00129                             IsViewIdSupported(viewId) &&
00130                             (m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr) == m_shapesMap.end())){
00131               Shapes& shapes = m_shapesMap[providerPtr];
00132 
00133               bool isBackground = ((flags & SF_BACKGROUND) != 0);
00134               CreateShapes(viewId, shapes);
00135 
00136               int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00137               for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00138                      iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00139                      if (shapePtr != NULL){
00140                             // If the shape should be placed in the scene background
00141                             // and is not already a background shape, move it to inactive layer:
00142                             if (isBackground && (shapePtr->GetLayerType() != iview::IViewLayer::LT_BACKGROUND)){
00143                                    iview::CShapeBase* shapeImplPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::CShapeBase*>(shapePtr);
00144                                    if (shapeImplPtr != NULL){
00145                                           shapeImplPtr->AssignToLayer(iview::IViewLayer::LT_INACTIVE);
00146                                    }
00147                             }
00148 
00149                             viewPtr->ConnectShape(shapePtr);
00150                      }
00151               }
00152        }
00153 
00154        if (showSlaveShapes && m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00155               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->AddItemsToScene(providerPtr, (flags | SF_BACKGROUND) & ~SF_DIRECT);
00156 
00157               m_isSlaveShown = true;
00158        }
00159        else{
00160               m_isSlaveShown = false;
00161        }
00162 
00163        if (flags & SF_DIRECT){
00164               UpdateViewCalibration(viewPtr);
00165        }
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 template <class Base>
00170 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr)
00171 {
00172        I_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00173 
00174        if (m_isSlaveShown){
00175               I_ASSERT(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid());
00176 
00177               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->RemoveItemsFromScene(providerPtr);
00178        }
00179 
00180        ShapesMap::iterator iter = m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr);
00181        if (iter != m_shapesMap.end()){
00182               iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00183 
00184               if (viewPtr != NULL){
00185                      Shapes& shapes = iter.value();
00186 
00187                      int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00188                      for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00189                             iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00190                             if (shapePtr != NULL){
00191                                    viewPtr->DisconnectShape(shapePtr);
00192                             }
00193                      }
00194               }
00195 
00196               m_shapesMap.erase(iter);
00197 
00198               if (m_viewCalibrationProviderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00199                      iview::CCalibratedViewBase* calibratedViewPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::CCalibratedViewBase*>(viewPtr);
00200                      if (calibratedViewPtr != NULL){
00201                             m_viewCalibrationPtr.Reset();
00202 
00203                             calibratedViewPtr->SetCalibrationPtr(NULL);
00204                      }
00205 
00206                      iview::ILogicalView* logicalViewPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::ILogicalView*>(viewPtr);
00207                      if (logicalViewPtr != NULL){
00208                             i2d::CAffine2d logToViewTransform;
00209                             logToViewTransform.Reset();
00210 
00211                             logicalViewPtr->SetLogToViewTransform(logToViewTransform);
00212                      }
00213               }
00214        }
00215 }

00220 template <class Base>
00221 bool TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::IsViewIdSupported(int viewId) const
00222 {
00223        if (m_idFiltersAttrPtr.IsValid()){
00224               int filtersCount = m_idFiltersAttrPtr.GetCount();
00225               for (int i = 0; i < filtersCount; ++i){
00226                      int filterId = m_idFiltersAttrPtr[i];
00227                      if (viewId == filterId){
00228                             return true;
00229                      }
00230               }
00231 
00232               return false;
00233        }
00234 
00235        return true;
00236 }

00241 {
00242        return m_shapesMap;

00246 template <class Base>
00247 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::UpdateAllViews()
00248 {
00249        for (ShapesMap::iterator index = m_shapesMap.begin(); index != m_shapesMap.end(); index++){
00250               IViewProvider* viewProvderPtr = index.key();
00251               I_ASSERT(viewProvderPtr != NULL);
00252 
00253               iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = viewProvderPtr->GetView();
00254               I_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00255 
00256               UpdateViewCalibration(viewPtr);
00257 
00258               viewPtr->Update();
00259        }
00260 }
00261 
00262 
00263 template <class Base>
00264 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::UpdateViewCalibration(iview::IShapeView* viewPtr)
00265 {
00266        if (m_viewCalibrationProviderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00267               const i2d::ITransformation2d* viewCalibrationPtr = m_viewCalibrationProviderCompPtr->GetCalibration();
00268 
00269               iview::CCalibratedViewBase* calibratedViewPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::CCalibratedViewBase*>(viewPtr);
00270               if (calibratedViewPtr != NULL){
00271                      if (viewCalibrationPtr != NULL){
00272                             m_viewCalibrationPtr.SetCastedOrRemove(viewCalibrationPtr->CloneMe());
00273                      }
00274                      else{
00275                             m_viewCalibrationPtr.Reset();
00276                      }
00277 
00278                      calibratedViewPtr->SetCalibrationPtr(m_viewCalibrationPtr.GetPtr());
00279               }
00280               
00281               i2d::CAffine2d logToViewTransform;
00282 
00283               if (viewCalibrationPtr != NULL){
00284                      viewCalibrationPtr->GetLocalTransform(i2d::CVector2d(0, 0), logToViewTransform);
00285               }
00286               else{
00287                      logToViewTransform.Reset();
00288               }
00289 
00290               iview::ILogicalView* logicalViewPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::ILogicalView*>(viewPtr);
00291               if (logicalViewPtr != NULL){
00292                      logicalViewPtr->SetLogToViewTransform(logToViewTransform);
00293               }
00294        }
00295 }
